message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can meet in the middle.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to make a serious commitment to buy the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offers. I'll sell the product to you for $100.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet us in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm still very interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I think $102 is the lowest I can go. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, so I'll offer $98. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to make another slight concession, but I think $105 is the lowest I can go. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and my original asking price.

Hi Alice, I understand you're trying to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a serious lowball offer of $85. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider buying from John.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $85. It's below my minimum price and doesn't reflect the product's true value. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think $110 is the lowest I can go. If you're willing to meet me here, I'll consider it.

Hi Alice, I've made several concessions and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to walk away from the deal if I don't get a better price. I'll offer $90, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll buy the product from John for $100.
